name: Panoramic Views over Lake Zurich
description: Spacious private room with panoramic views of Lake Zurich, two private balconies, direct lake access, private bathroom, close city connection, and sunrise and sunset views.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in a very quiet area with direct access to Lake Zurich. The neighborhood remains peaceful at night. The bus stop right outside the house has departures every 7 minutes to the city center at Bürkliplatz (10 minutes), and it takes 15-20 minutes to reach the main train station. Several restaurants are nearby, ranging from exclusive waterfront fine dining to traditional Swiss cuisine.
host_about: We are a multicultural family. We like arts and music.  I come from Peru we like travel, every year one or two times.

name: Discover Zürich & relax comfortably
description: Bright & sunny room (17sqm/172sqft) in 3-bedroom apartment. Situated at the outskirts of Zürich, in a very quiet & green surrounding. Convenient bus&train connection with Airport (35min), City Centre/central station/old town (25min), Gqqgle HQ (25min), University & ETH (30-45mi),Lindt & Sprüngli, IBM Search Lab, GDI (10-15min walk or bus), Lake Zürich 10 min. walk. Free private parking. Ideal for a weekend or for a long-term stay (1-3 months) if you are here on a work assignment, internship etc.
neighborhood_overview:
Wollishofen-Kilchberg is a very green, quiet and first of all residential area. Due to its characteristics and proximity to the center it is in high demand. It offers nice views into green gardens, panoramic views over the lake and the mountains.
You will be woken up by birdsongs and not by traffic.
Some of the nicest lakeside bars and restaurants you can find along the Lake Zürich are nearby. (lf you look at the map indication of my listing click on the icons for restaurants or point of views you will find around my place to get some ideas.)
Also the famous LINDT chocolate factory and there gorgeous outlet shop is located nearby and you can often smell a slight fragrance of chocolate in the air.
To have space, peace, a safe neighborhood and a lot of green around is what I love most living here and would like to share with you.
host_about:
“It is passion that makes man live;  reason makes one only last.” 
― Nicolas Chamfort
"Durch die Leidenschaften lebt der Mensch, durch die Vernunft existiert er bloss."

This is my motto  in life and I try to live up to it as much as I can. I have traveled extensively for work and leisure and made invaluable experiences during my trips. I am passionate about wine, food, exotic herbs and plants. But nothing beats good company and great talks! My home is my castle I love and I care about. You are welcome to share and enjoy it with me.

I am an easy going, open minded person with a lot of interests.  I love reading  and I am an "old school" newspaper addict. On a Sunday morning you will most likely find me on the sofa surrounded by newspapers and magazines and well equipped with coffee and cookies to indulge in what is going on in the world. 
*******************************************************************
Note to Guests
• I enjoy meeting people and like to know who my guests are. Write a bit about yourself and your purpose of travelling. That way I not only get a better picture of you but can come up with valuable information and ideas to make your arrival and stay pleasent, convenient and memorable.
• A novel of your life story isn't necessary; just write about what you think someone meeting you for the first time would want to know.

description: A cozy and comfortable room, well located within the center of Zurich, which means walking and transport is great. It contains all the basic necessities you'd need to enjoy a comfortable stay. Lots of sunlight with an outgoing and welcoming host.
neighborhood_overview:
Kreis 5 is not just hip, but it's a walk away from everything and some of the coolest parts of town. If you have an affinity for partying, you are a 5-minute walk away from Langstrasse. If you want to get to the main station, hop on a 5-minute tram (or walk 10 minutes). Very convenient when you've got a flight/train to catch at the last minute.
Even more convenient since we have 3 tram lines right at our doorstep, so if you miss one, there's always another.
We are also right by the Limmat river, which in the summer is fantastic to go swimming in, besides the lake area. But should you want to get to the lake, in 15 minutes tram ride you're there!

neighborhood_overview:
Hirschengraben in Zurich is a notable area that serves as a gateway to a wealth of historical, cultural, and recreational opportunities within the city. Its proximity to the central parts of Zurich, including the main train station, the university, and key shopping and dining venues, makes it an ideal starting point for exploring the city's rich offerings.

Historical and Cultural Highlights

The area around Hirschengraben is steeped in history and culture. The University of Zurich and the ETH Zurich are prestigious institutions that not only contribute to the city's academic prestige but also offer various public events, lectures, and exhibitions. The proximity to the Old Town allows visitors to immerse themselves in Zurich's medieval history, wandering through narrow alleys, admiring centuries-old buildings, and visiting landmarks like the Grossmünster and Fraumünster churches, which are known for their stunning architecture and stained glass windows.

name: Stauffacher Apartment- Rodriguez
description: On 33 sqm this beautiful and furnished 2.5 room business flat offers a maximum comfort. The furnished business apartment impresses through its central location in Zurich and its modern equipment. Form the business rental you reach the main station in a few minutes and you are perfectly connected to the public transport. The beautiful Bäckeranlage park is located opposite the business apartment. Here you can stroll and find recreation.
neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. The apartment is located next to the “Bäckeranlage” park and is still close to the heart of Zurich. The famous shopping areas like the Bahnhofstrasse or the old town "Niederdorf" with its many shops and restaurants are only a few minutes away by tram. The apartment is directly accessible by public transport. The nearest tram station "Helevetiaplatz" is only 150m away – from which you have direct connections to the lake and the famous “Bahnhofstrasse”. The main station in Zurich can be reached in about 12 minutes by tram or bus. There are Supermarkets in the direct vicinity. The “Denner” and “Coop” supermarkets are only 100m away.

description: Welcome to our Studio, nestled in the heart of Zurich! Once you enter, you will experience the blend of modern comfort and urban convenience. neighborhood_overview:
Hirschengraben in Zurich is a notable area that serves as a gateway to a wealth of historical, cultural, and recreational opportunities within the city. Its proximity to the central parts of Zurich, including the main train station, the university, and key shopping and dining venues, makes it an ideal starting point for exploring the city's rich offerings.

Historical and Cultural Highlights

The area around Hirschengraben is steeped in history and culture. The University of Zurich and the ETH Zurich are prestigious institutions that not only contribute to the city's academic prestige but also offer various public events, lectures, and exhibitions. The proximity to the Old Town allows visitors to immerse themselves in Zurich's medieval history, wandering through narrow alleys, admiring centuries-old buildings, and visiting landmarks like the Grossmünster and Fraumünster churches, which are known for their stunning architecture and stained glass windows.

description:
This unique apartment not only is a one bedroom flat, but it has a nice, quite big kitchen with a breakfast table, a private garden with another table to enjoy some quiet moments or hosting guests. Guests have their own toilet as you have your master bathroom with a double-bathtub, a separate rainfall shower, toilet, wash machine and dryer. In-between your bedroom and bathroom, there is a dressing room with closets and access to your own storage space, e.g. for your suitcases.

You enter this apartment by a door that is completely separate from the other main entrance of the house.

Happy to provide support and/or tips about what to do here in Zurich.

The apartment is in a residential neighborhood. A few shops are within walking distance. Nearby public transportation provides a 20-minute ride to downtown Zurich and reaches the airport in 30 minutes.

Feel very welcome and enjoy the personal touch in this outstanding location!

host_about:
The comfortable furnished apartments of PABS Résidences + Appartements AG in central Zurich can be easily booked within few minutes. Their comfort is very attractive, the rents are fair and "all inclusive". For 26 years now, PABS Résidences + Appartments AG has been helping private and corporate clients find furnished apartments and residences to rent in the centre of Zurich. PABS Résidences + Appartements AG is also the leading contact for relocation companies and people who are moving to Zurich temporarily.

Beautiful and modern furnished apartments in the heart of Zurich
If you plan to stay in Zurich for longer than 14 days, you can browse through our 250 low-priced apartments on this home page under "Apartment search".

Comfortable, furnished rental apartments: great value to suit your every need:
A wide range of apartments in the Zurich city centre and all central city districts.
Full service with a central, competent contact person for advice, reservations, rental contracts, check-in and check-out.
Booking, checking in and checking out all take just a few minutes – saving you plenty of time.
All-inclusive, first-rate services (weekly cleaning thanks to our cleaning staff, repair service, emergency service 24/24).
Information is constantly updated. Simply download the iOS App or follow our social media pages (see links on this page).
With its wide selection of 250 furnished apartments in Zurich, PABS Résidences und Appartements AG offers you a great deal of choice. The standard minimum rental period for furnished apartments is one month. A furnished apartment is usually available for last minute bookings for rental periods of 14 days or longer.

At PABS Ltd., we provide you with comprehensive information and a list of furnished apartments in Zurich with plenty of great value offers (by telephone or email). Our standard apartments include: a modern, well-equipped kitchen, TV, appliances and household infrastructure as well as fresh sheets and towels. The rental price for all apartments includes the costs for electricity, water and heating, TV, weekly cleaning and laundry service.

Our top priority at PABS Ltd. is making sure that our clients are satisfied with the apartments they rent.

name: Your own apartment in Zurich center
description:
Lovely place with separate house entry. Apartment just for yourself. The apartment is simple, but has a separate bedroom (bed 1.60x2.00) with sofa, kitchen and also separate bathroom. Wifi provided. It's ground floor.

Two stops from Central by tram. Next to the ETH/University with beautiful views as well. Direct connection to the airport right next to the house.

The place is quiet, even being so centrally located. You enter the apartment a key code. You have your own entrance to the house.
host_about:
Most of the apartements you can see in my profiIe are not mine. I manage them for my friends and they all have gorgeous places! So if you need a place to stay - likely I will have a bed available somewhere:)

I personally love to host people from all over the world. It's a great pleasure and joy to make your stay as nice as possible. I always stay with AirBnB when I'm travelling, so it could be that we see each other again...:) Be my guest!

name: THE FLAG Zurich - Business Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Business Double (20sqm) with 140 cm bedding, partly with small balcony, Shower/WC, Hair dryer
Fully equipped Kitchenette (without hob), Fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, Kettle
Free water bottle on arrival
Small Seating Area, Safe, Flatscreen TV, Ironing Station
Free W-Lan, Digital E-Concierge, Free access to digital Newspapers, USB Ports
Free access to fitness room and public terrace
Breakfast 20.00 CHF per Person additional.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

name: Bright & Stylish 1BR - Near Google HQ & Center '2
description:
This comfortable 1 Bedroom apartment is on the 4th floor of newly renovated building located in a central, residential area of Zürich.
Wether you are travelling alone, for business or for vacations, this apartment will be perfect for a maximum group of 5 people.
Located in Wiedikon, Zürich. It is just 10 minutes to the vibrant city centre of Zürich and Google HQ. Packed with lots of restaurants and shops, the lake is just a few minutes away!
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions :)
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and very safe even at late night. You will find local supermarkets and small grocery shops, and nice bars and restaurants on the adjacent streets as well as a major shopping center (“Sihlcity”).
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us.

name: Brandnew studio-suite with balcony
description: New beautiful modern studio, perfect location in the city center with many trendy restaurants, bars and boutiques around in the area near the beautiful historical city. Only in few minutes to the  lake or to the main railstation with direct access to the airport and mountains. Good Wifi and cable TV. Ventilationssystem for closed windows. Own balcony and 2 supermarkets in front of the house !
neighborhood_overview:
Seefeld is a district of Zurich on the right bank of Lake Zurich.
There are numerous bars and restaurants all within walking distance. Directly in the house is the restaurant IRO where you can also have a nice brunch on Sundays.
2 supermarkets are located directly opposite the apartment. Also one playground for the little ones is across the street. A post office is right around the corner in the Hoeschgasse.
It is also worth visiting the Tiefenbrunnen baths, the Chinagarten garden followed by a visit to the Fischerstube restaurant and the Le Corbusier museum. The Botanical Garden is also just 1 stop away by bus 33. The opera can be reached in 3 minutes on lines 2 and 4. In the Dofourstrasse, a parallel road to the lake, there is the Italian restaurant Capri or Amalfi - both highly recommended.

name: N5 Apartment in the heart of Zurich
description:
Enjoy in this charming holiday home an all-round comfort in a prime location!

Small but nice, that's the motto of this cozy and charming holiday apartment in Zurich. In this furnished holiday flat you live in the centre of Zurich in the famous Niederdorf and you can truely experience the lifestyle of Zurich. The furnished holiday home has one room and offers space for a total of three guests. Moreover, the vacation rental features a small kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: The charming Niederdorf V-Apartment is located in the same house as the Niederdorf I Apartment and only a few steps from the Limmatquai and also the lake can easily be reached by foot. Located in the vibrant old part of Zurich called “Niederdorf” with its many restaurants and shops, you can find this newly decorated 1-bedroom apartment. For all gourmets this apartment is paradise. In the heart of the old town of Zurich (Niederdorf) is the small but beautiful "Niederdorf III-Apartment ". Here is a restaurant lined up after another. Whether for traditional Swiss dishes like fondue or raclette or any international cuisine, everybody gets his or her money worth.

name: Balcony Suite in the City (SH-2.4R)
description: Welcome to the Balcony Suite in Zurich, your tranquil retreat amidst the city's vibrant life. This luxurious 2.5-room apartment with its balcony is your gateway to an unforgettable Zurich experience. Enjoy the convenience of a fully equipped kitchen and in-unit laundry, ensuring a seamless stay. Your Zurich sanctuary awaits, designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation, inviting you to unwind in style after exploring the city's charm.
neighborhood_overview: Nestled in the heart of Zurich, Schaffhausserstrasse is a prime location that offers both the tranquility of a residential area and the vibrancy of city life. This neighborhood is a stone's throw away from Zurich's Old Town, known for its historical buildings, quaint cafes, and boutique shops. Enjoy easy access to Lake Zurich for picturesque views and outdoor activities. The area boasts excellent connectivity with public transportation, making it a breeze to explore all that Zurich has to offer, from cultural attractions to its renowned dining scene.
host_about:
Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

We specialize in providing serviced apartments that are ideal for both short-term and long-term stays, and we offer a range of options to meet the unique needs of each client. From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

host_about:

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

name: Villa Allegra Studio - Bohemian chic in Zurich
description: Located in a residential district of Zurich, Villa Allegra is an old lady built in 1907 in a typical Swiss mountain chalet style. It’s situated, not far from the city center by foot (22 minutes) or by public transport (14 minutes) to Bellevue, yet set in beautiful natural green surroundings with open views. The studio with about 30 sqm of space is available to you with a kitchenette and bathroom, that can host up to 2 adults. The house is divided in 3 units of which 2 are offered on AirBnB.com
neighborhood_overview: My personal tips and guide is set up for you to see in my Airbnb profile. Many known places for sure some secrets coming from me as a local Zurich habitant. But nevertheless this location is very close to the lake and Bellevue, as it is a jump away from the university campus and ETH. Zurich is a little big city, but for main sightseeing you are quite fast everywhere in town. The Kunsthaus is just around the corner, also the famous Bahnhofstrasse, but if you look for peace and quiet, take the Dolderbahn and walk in the forest above Zurich.
host_about:
We are are a family of four, two school-girls, my husband, me and four bunnies named Frida, Sugar, Cruella & Armstrong.

We love to travel ourselves and enjoy being adventures and learning about new things, cultures and habits while we are abroad. Biggest love is Paris and New York; Tel Aviv has been a regular and can't be missed at least once a year, the food is divine! Actually bohemian-chic and boutique hotels are the places you would find us most. We appreciate the special gems around the globe.

At our home we are happy to share any inside tips with our guests, but of course are respecting the privacy of your stay. For that reason we're also expecting the privat area of ours to be valued.

My husband and I own a film production company and work with our team from the villa. Our big passion is film, has been always and still fascinates us every day. 

Cooking and hosting is another big love of mine, but the biggest is my family, for me I enjoy having quality time with them. Lucky us, the family even expands to a great group of dear friends, so our life is blessed with lot's of good energy and fine people.

Since we acquired the villa a few years ago, another joy finds its way into our environment; I absolutely love to decorate and interior design spaces. In little steps we've been renovating the house, giving it back it's old beauty. Amazing how it's changing step by step. Sharing it with guests is great. 

I am so curious about life and who we are in ourselves, I love the journey day by day!

name: Villa Allegra 2BR - Bohemian chic in Zurich
description:
Located half way above Zurich in the mansions district, Villa Allegra is an old lady build in 1907 in a typical Swiss mountain chalet style.

It’s situated, not far from the city center by foot, public transport or taxi and yet set in beautiful natural green surroundings.

The 2BR is a lovely charming 3 room apartment with about 70 sqm of space available that can host up to 4 adults. It has a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. A private patio with table and chairs invites you to chill.
neighborhood_overview:
It is one of the exclusive residential area of Zurich called the "Sonnenberg" (sunny hill) overlooking the city.

A 15 minutes walk will take you to Bellevue, the lake and downtown.

Going up the hill will take you very fast to the lovely city forest and a great view point to even get a better view of our city.

Other then that, around us many old houses, a church nearby - kind of secluded but still in the middle of it. Please be aware, it is a city after all - not New York with crazy noise but not Zen-Silence like in the wilderness either!

name: Charming Popup Hotel-Double Room (shared bathroom)
description: Our pop-up hotel is located in the heart of Zurich's Old Town and is giving new life to a hotel in a house which has a 500-years history. All rooms have an individual layout and might vary from what you can see in the pictures. Our double rooms are ideal for travellers who are looking for a central but affordable stay, that offers a glimpse into the history of a temporarily used hotel and are not afraid to share our communal bathrooms with other guests.
neighborhood_overview: The Krone Zurich is ideally located – whether you are planning a city getaway or a business trip to the beautiful city on the Limmat. Our personally managed hotel is only five minutes from the central train station, and you can comfortably see the sites by foot, or by public transport. Please note, that we have no restaurant at our hotel. There are many cafés, restaurants and bars just around the corner and we will be happy to help you choose the right one for you.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

name: THE FLAG Zürich - Comfort Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Large Room (24 sqm) with king size or queen size double bed, shower/toilette, hair dryer
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station
free W-Lan, digital E-Concierge, free access to digital newspapers, USB ports
on request breakfast buffet (CHF 20 per person) or snacks for on the go in the restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

name: THE FLAG Zürich -Executive Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Large Executive apartment (26 sqm) with king size or queen size double bed, shower/toilette, hair dryer
private terrace
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station
free W-Lan, digital E-Concierge, free access to digital newspapers, USB ports
on request breakfast buffet (CHF 20 per person) or snacks for on the go in the restaurant
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert

name: Hotel Alexander Zürich - Double room (Wlan)
description:
Our personally managed Hotel Alexander in Zurich is located in a prime location in the heart of Zurich's Old Town - just a five-minute walk from Zurich's main train station.
We are always happy to help with any questions or recommendations.

During their time with us, our guests benefit from the use of mobile wifi hot spots and free admission to Zurich Zoo.
(Attention: Hotspots and tickets are limited).
neighborhood_overview: In the immediate vicinity of the Hotel Alexander, in addition to Zurich's most famous landmarks, are the banking and business district, the Bahnhofstrasse shopping mile, the Zurich university quarter of the ETH/Uni, the car-free lake and river promenade, the Zurich Exhibition Center and a variety of cafés, bars and restaurants.
host_about: Das ***Hotel Alexander sowie das **Alexander Guesthouse sind beides familiengeführte Betriebe in der 3. Generation. In unserem persönlich und familiär geführten Hotel mit zwei Häusern, legen wir Wert auf Schweizer Gastlichkeit. Die Familie Helbling und das Hotel Alexander Team heissen Sie ganz herzlich willkommen in der Zürcher Altstadt.

name: Studio in the most charming area of Zurich Seefeld
description:
Cosy and smart! – Compact but not petty.

Charming housing space, combined with a large dose of functionality at a great value for money. The best: you have a private terrace to enjoy.

The newly renovated & high quality completed property on 5 floors with elevator is located on an almost traffic-free one-way street and each apartment is accessible via a charming passageway with a view of an unobstructable green meadow. The lake is located 3 mins away.

Need a parking? We have 5 single boxes
neighborhood_overview:
The lake is just 3 mins away!

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. Here you will find numerous neighbourhood shops, a wide range of restaurants from trendy to gourmet, fashionable boutiques, galleries and countless local recreational opportunities.
host_about: Hi there! I am working in real estate & hospitality businesses and enjoy meeting new people from all over the world. Our company COSMPOPOLITAN APARTMENTS is offering serviced apartments with style. Looking for a fab place to stay? You've found it! :-)

name: Zürich 2,5 Zimmer-Zuhause mit Aussicht 65 qm
description:
Absolute top location in Zurich. The Top is an extremely sunny beautiful large quiet 2.5 room apartment of 65m2 on the 1st floor with elevator. The 2 large bedrooms (all with new guest mattresses) comfortably accommodate 8 travelers. All rooms with new mineral natural floor and floor heating. Large balcony/big terrace and large garden all around the house

- WM and Tumbler for an additional fee

Entire 2.5 room apartment can also be rented for CHF 2880. NK/month to be rented.
neighborhood_overview:
District 7 in Zurich
Kreis 7 is considered Zurich's top residential area. It is popular because of the tranquility, the sunshine and the beautiful old buildings. Anyone who lives on the Zurich or Adlisberg has high standards. The buildings are maintained or old buildings are replaced by new buildings.
The forest and various parks offer plenty of space for sporting activities or for relaxing hours.
For children there is a large Robinson playground in close proximity. Beach/bathing establishments and outdoor pools are easily accessible by public transport.
In the nearest area you can shop comfortably in Migros, Coop or Denner or enjoy a breakfast in the Honold - Confiserie and bakery.

description: Welcome to our Studio, nestled in the heart of Zurich! Once you enter, you will experience the blend of modern comfort and urban convenience. neighborhood_overview:
Hirschengraben in Zurich is a notable area that serves as a gateway to a wealth of historical, cultural, and recreational opportunities within the city. Its proximity to the central parts of Zurich, including the main train station, the university, and key shopping and dining venues, makes it an ideal starting point for exploring the city's rich offerings.

Historical and Cultural Highlights

The area around Hirschengraben is steeped in history and culture. The University of Zurich and the ETH Zurich are prestigious institutions that not only contribute to the city's academic prestige but also offer various public events, lectures, and exhibitions. The proximity to the Old Town allows visitors to immerse themselves in Zurich's medieval history, wandering through narrow alleys, admiring centuries-old buildings, and visiting landmarks like the Grossmünster and Fraumünster churches, which are known for their stunning architecture and stained glass windows.

name: Zimmer OCEAN für 4 in Villa zw. Airport+Zentrum
description:
Room OCEAN/balcony for 4 people in beautiful villa with garden, ideal between airport and city center! Close to indoor stadium, with parking spaces and super public transport connection/shops within 150 m.

20m2, king-size bed 1,80m and sofa bed 1,60m, wardrobe and chest of drawers, table+2 chairs etc

A modern bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen and a 40m2 guest lounge next to 1'200m2 private garden are at your disposal - a unique accommodation!
neighborhood_overview:
The quiet residential area (detached houses) is ideally located between the airport and the city center - both can be reached within 15 minutes.
Just 1000m from Zurich-Oerlikon station (2 bus stops), where trains from all over Switzerland stop, CASA BLUMER is an ideal starting point for all activities.
Expo/Hallenstadion/Theater 11 are within a short walking distance.
The highlight of the neighborhood IS the garden of CASA BLUMER over 1200m2 with marquee, lounge and 2 barbecue areas where our guests can relax after tourism or business.
host_about:
I conserve this villa with great joy, as the home of my familiy since 1942.
My mum left me turtoises to look for and a 1200m2 garden I keep a nice paradise for my guests and bees/butterflies.

Please enjoy it with me !

name: Ein Zuhause in der Stadt
description:
This small and pleasant studio apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a small apartment building in Zurich Oerlikon opposite the Catholic Church where the bells beat the hours.
10-minute walk from the indoor stadium in the middle of a quiet neighborhood and yet close to public transport (tram no. 7,9.10,14) as well as shopping, market on Saturday, restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Close to the forest and yet in the middle of the city.
host_about:
We are a mother daughters team based here in Zurich and Rekingen. Both locally based to each apartment, we enjoy meeting the guests, ensuring their needs are met and helping them as much as we can. We hope that our apartments provides you not only with the perfect launching pad to explore but a home away from home where you can relax in comfort.

As we both love travelling and meeting people from around the world we look forward meeting you.

WELCOME!

One important landmark is the Hallenstadion, an arena that hosts concerts and sports events. Other local highlights include the Kunsteisbahn Oerlikon skating rink and Theater 11 Zürich, where you can catch a traveling Broadway show. The neighborhood is also the setting for the city's sprawling Messe Zürich exhibition center, a busy meeting space that's surrounded by a variety of shops and restaurants. The Zürich Oerlikon train station is a major hub, making it easy to get around the city and further afield.

name: Blueground | Unterstrass, storage, 2 min to market
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this one bedroom apartment in District 6, Unterstrass. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, cozy living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH18)
neighborhood_overview: Unterstrass comprises part of Zurich's sixth district and stretches north from the city center. This vast area was an independent municipality before being incorporated into Zurich in 1893. The neighborhood is home to the Irchelpark campus of the University of Zurich -- not to be confused with Irchel Park, a lovely greenspace that is open to the public. Unterstrass is also the setting for Schindlergut and Beckenhof, two city parks that offer gorgeous Limmat views. There's a variety of both Swiss and international cuisine on offer, including Thai and Mexican food as well as pizza. Unterstrass is served by several bus and tram lines.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, storage, nr local market
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this stylish one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 3, Wiedikon home with stunning balcony views over the city. (ID #ZRH17)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

name: Blueground | Werd, furnished, storage area
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this beautiful one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 4, Werd home with stunning views over the city. (ID #ZRH16)
neighborhood_overview: Centrally located Werd may be small, but there's no shortage of things to do. The neighborhood is home to a thriving restaurant scene that encompasses both traditional Swiss food and the cuisine of Greece, Japan, Mexico, and more. There are also plenty of rollicking pubs and trendy bars like Kraftwerk, which serves coffee during the day and cocktails at night. Werd is home to the Museum Haus Konstruktiv, a converted power station that is now a showplace for contemporary art. There's also the quirky Jeans Museum and the Foundation FCZ Museum, an homage to the FC Zürich football team. Werd is served by several bus, tram and S-Bahn lines, and has two major train stations, Wiedikon and Selnau.

neighborhood_overview: Just southeast of central Zurich is Weinegg, a sprawling, semi-rural district set on a wooden hillside far above the city. This peaceful area is an easy introduction to the city, with plenty of conveniences. There are also notable cultural attractions, including Zurich's Tram Museum, where you can see decommissioned cars from the 19th and 20th centuries, and the University of Zurich Botanical Gardens, where you can explore the world of plants. Wine lovers will want to save time on the weekends to explore the various vineyards set in the hills of Weinegg. The neighborhood is served by several bus, tram and S-Bahn lines, making it easy to get around.
host_about:

description:
PROMOTION: WE ABSORB THE GUEST SERVICE FEE (14-20%) WHICH AIRBNB NORMALLY CHARGES THE GUESTS

Highlights:
Washing machine & Dryer
Travel Adapter
Ricecooker
Sofabed & Baby Cot (on request)
3 train stops to Airport
1 train stop to Zurich HB
4 tram stops to Paradeplatz
15 min walk to Bahnhofstrasse

Indulge in the comfort of our 80 sqm space, featuring a well-equipped kitchen. Explore the safe neighborhood lined with trendy eateries, cafes & supermarkets – a rare gem in the city center!
neighborhood_overview:
Coolest area in Zurich!
You will live very close to the city and find trendy bars and good restaurants of different cuisines as well as museums and nightlife all very close by.

Supermarkets and pharmacies are within close walking distance.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Cher.
 
 I enjoy traveling around the world, exploring new destinations, staying at luxury properties and  learning about other cultures. 

My philosophy is "Be a traveler, not a tourist!"
 
You are most welcome to come and stay in my unique apartments in Zurich, which have been prepared with you, the traveller in mind! The apartment will be your home away from home. 
 
 I consider each one of you as my guests and not customers. I will be very happy to give you recommendations during your stay, and I have prepared a bespoke Manual which upon check-in will give you useful information about the location, public transport and recommendations to restaurants and cafes in the neighbourhood, with clear directions how to get there from the apartment.

name: Stylish Triplex Rooftop Apartment
description:
This stylish rooftop apartment is our beloved Swiss home. Located in Alt Wiedikon, a quiet residential area in Zurich City and in short distance to parks and the cities attractions. Ideal for a family or a group of friends but will also suite a couple who wants some extra space.
Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun and an amazing outdoor space to enjoy the summer days.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Alt Wiedikon, a residential neighbourhood in the city of Zurich and within a short distance to parks, shops, attractions and restaurants. The neighbourhood is safe and quiet and the apartment is only 2 stops away (5 minutes ride by the S10 train) from the central train station.
host_about:
I am in my early forties, father of 4 and well travelled, with 4 continents and over 40 countries visited, lived or worked in. I love spending time outdoor, hiking, skiing, snowboarding and all related mountaineering activities. I do enjoy travelling the globe in search of new and enriching experiences as well as to discover new people, food and drinks.
I am running my own business at the crossroad of tech and cannabis industry.

name: Blueground | Wollishofen, w/d, storage, nr market
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this lovely one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 2, Wollishofen home with stunning balcony views over the river. (ID #ZRH21)
neighborhood_overview: Set on the left bank of Lake Zurich, Wollishofen is a beautiful neighborhood that is prized for its twin waterside parks, Landiwiese and Saffa-Insel. This Central Zurich area is also known for great cuisine, including Irish pubs, casual spots catering to students and a variety of international restaurants and small shops. Other neighborhood highlights include the Rote Fabrik, a former factory that has been repurposed as a performing arts center, and the quirky Ortsmuseum Wollishofen. The incredible Reitberg Museum is just a short walk away from Wollishofen. The neighborhood is served by several bus, tram and S-Bahn lines, making it easy to get around.

neighborhood_overview:
You are in the city center of Zurich.
- Parking is free only for the night and only during the weekend if you park in the blue zone on the streets (blue lines marked on certain streets).
- Parkandi Parkhaus is 4 minutes walking distance from the apartment and the cost for parking is approximately 30 to 40 francs/1 day. Please check the prices again before parking.
host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely District 10, Wipkingen furnished one bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and spacious living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH32)
neighborhood_overview: Serene Wipkingen is one of the quarters of Zürich's tenth district. Set along the Limmat River, this dynamic area is ideal for new arrivals to the city. There are a variety of cafes, bars and restaurants near the riverbank, including everything from regional French cuisine to pizza to Indian barbecue. There is also a supermarket in Wipkingen for anyone who prefers to self cater. Several museums, including the National Finance Museum, and a cinema are a short walk from Wipkingen. The neighborhood is served by several tram and bus lines as well as local and regional rail from Zürich Wipkingen train station.

name: Beautiful Yellow Apartment
description:
Staying at this AirBnb has been described as comfortable, bright, and homely.
There are two rooms. One is a bed room and the other is a living room that can be changed into a bedroom when more than two people stay.
No TV is a minus point for some, but it enhances personal conversations.
The bed sofa is comfy. I cover it with a mattress for comfort and hygiene reasons.
There is always a big and a small towel per person provided. Also each person gets their own du et and their own pillow.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Kreis 6, which is the area of all Zurich universities. In this area you can find a lot of local restaurants, coffeeshops and bars where young and old meet each other.

The apartment is 1min walking distance from a big park called Irchel Park, which is wonderful for a daily connection to nature and fresh air. Additionally, the park leads to the woods which is magical during every season.

I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: Fantastic 1 BR flat in the city center (West 7)
description:
Fantastic one bedroom flat in the city center.
The apartment is 51 sqm, on the first floor and it has a nice and sunny balcony.
The bedroom has a double bed and in the living room there is a sofa bed big enough for 2 adults - max capacity 4 guests.
The bathroom has a bath tube.
Washer and dryer are in the apartment for your own use.
The kitchen is fully equipped with a Nespresso Coffe machine for your perfect breakfast !
neighborhood_overview: Around the building there are many bars, restaurants and grocery shops. The flat is in the city center.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, storage, 1 min to market
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish District 3, Wiedikon furnished three bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and beautiful living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH45)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

name: Urban Oasis with Queen Bed and City View (BE-12)
description: Welcome to our charming studio, a cozy retreat nestled in the heart of the city. This stylish space offers a comfortable double bed, modern amenities, and a prime location for exploring the vibrant surroundings. Ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking a compact yet inviting urban escape. Enjoy the convenience of nearby attractions, trendy bars, and easy access to public transportation. Make your stay memorable in this intimate hideaway that balances comfort and city living seamlessly.
neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of our city-centric location. Our studio is nestled in the trendy Kreis 3 district, just minutes away from Löwenplatz and Bahnhofplatz/HB. Explore the hip bars, cozy cafes, and diverse dining options right outside your door. Convenience is key with a Coop, pharmacy, and Grand Café Lochergut steps away. Excellent public transportation links from Lochergut tram station (2 and 3) make it easy to discover the city's charm. Experience the perfect blend of urban living and local amenities in this lively neighborhood.
host_about:
Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

We specialize in providing serviced apartments that are ideal for both short-term and long-term stays, and we offer a range of options to meet the unique needs of each client. From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

name: Blueground | Wollishofen, w/d & storage, nr market
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this pretty one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 2, Wollishofen home . (ID #ZRH60)
neighborhood_overview: Set on the left bank of Lake Zurich, Wollishofen is a beautiful neighborhood that is prized for its twin waterside parks, Landiwiese and Saffa-Insel. This Central Zurich area is also known for great cuisine, including Irish pubs, casual spots catering to students and a variety of international restaurants and small shops. Other neighborhood highlights include the Rote Fabrik, a former factory that has been repurposed as a performing arts center, and the quirky Ortsmuseum Wollishofen. The incredible Reitberg Museum is just a short walk away from Wollishofen. The neighborhood is served by several bus, tram and S-Bahn lines, making it easy to get around.

Comfortable room for 1-2 people on the 4th floor of a building in the heart of Zurich. Tram stop right in front of 10 minutes by tram from the main train station in Zürich, a few minutes from the lake, dozens of shops, museums, restaurants and the nightlife of Zürich.
* super central location in the heart of the beautiful city.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, storage, 1 min to market
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this charming studio Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 3, Wiedikon home . (ID #ZRH54)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: 3BDR Duplex + Sky roof - Zurich
description:
Featuring city views, Modern 3BDR Duplex with Skyroof in Trendy Zurich West provides accommodation with a terrace and a kitchen, around 3.4 km from Bahnhofstrasse. It features mountain views and free WiFi.
This apartment is equipped with 3 BDR, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, and a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided.

City Center & Main Railway Station are 3.5 km from the apartment, The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 12 km from the apartment.

name: Numa | M Studio w/ Kitchenette & Balcony
description: This 21 sqm studio is ideal for up to two people. It offers a cozy queen size bed, a modern kitchenette with sink, stove, microwave, and a lovely balcony, where you can unwind after a day in Zurich.
neighborhood_overview: Langstrasse is known for its young and night scene. Here, you will never get bored at the weekends. Bars and nightclubs are all around the street and perfect for having fun with locals and foreigners all night long. Additionally, there are various places to shop and eat, such as luxury streetwear boutiques, international eateries, and burger spots. Summer concerts are staged at the pavilion in the Bäckeranlage, and travelling shows and circus activities are housed in the barracks area.
host_about: In a world of stuffy, faceless hotels, we’re leading the industry into a new era. We’re replacing the unnecessary hassle with simplicity and delight. Mixing technology and taste together in the world’s greatest neighbourhoods, we create stays that are unashamedly original and unforgettably authentic. With the comforts of home and the quality of a boutique hotel, we make sure you have everything you need to live like a local, escape for a weekend, or unwind during a business trip. Want to stay with us for longer? We’ve designed our properties with your joy in mind, whether you stay for a night, a week, or a season.

name: Studio-Central Train Station ZH
description:
Brand New Studio in front of Zurich Central Train Station.
Perfect for both tourists & business travelers.
- All tour buses within Switzerland depart from the Bus stop next to the apartment.
All the major restaurants, bars, coffee shops, & museums, of the city are within walking distance.
- Right in front of Zurich Central Train station (HB)
- Best Location in the city
- Brand new studio & building (absolutely modern & fresh look)
- Migros supermarket in same building (affordable price for food)
neighborhood_overview:
Distance to (by Public Transportation):
*In front of Zurich's main train station (HB)
*1 minute to the main long-distance bus station
* 6 minutes to the Langstrasse
* 9 minutes to the Zurich Airport

Distance to (by Walking):
* 5 minutes to the Bahnhofstrasse
* 10 minutes to Old Town
host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: 2,5 Zimmer Whg in ZH-Altstetten
description:
Enjoy the simple life in this quiet and centrally located accommodation in Zurich Altstetten, Letzigund Stadium, Swisscom Arena, shopping (supermarkets), banks, connection to the city center in just a few minutes (2 stops), by S-Bahn [suburban train], tram and bus.
Bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room offers enough space for a pleasant stay.
Home office thanks to super fast internet (WiFi) is also no problem.
host_about:
Ich lebe und arbeite in Zürich seit über 15 Jahren und helfe sehr gerne, wenn es Fragen rund um Zürich geht.
Gerne biete ich meine Unterkunft an bei (temporären) Abwesenheiten...

neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

name: Blueground | Enge, storage & w/d, in Fifa Museum
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this sophisticated one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 2, Enge home with stunning balcony views over the city. (ID #ZRH82)
neighborhood_overview: Enge is nestled between the Limmat River and Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood is part of Zürich's 2nd district. This tiny area packs in a lot to see and do. Enge is home to the FIFA World Football Museum and the Museum Rietberg, a 19th century villa that now displays non-European artworks. There are also several parks to enjoy: heavily landscaped Reiter Park recalls the glamorous of a bygone age while lakeside Belvoirpark is perfect for a picnic or morning jog. You can find everything from fast food to traditional Swiss cuisine to sushi in Enge. The neighborhood is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn trains.

name: Fantastic Penthouse (Mainau 14)
description:
Fantastic penthouse (145 sqm) in the city center !
The flat has 3 bedrooms with double beds and sofa bed in living room, 2 bathrooms with shower and bath tub an amazing and well furnished kitchen.
In the living room there is even a fire place.
The 3 balconies are amazing and the perfect place to relax after a busy day.
The washer and dryer are in the apartment for your own use.
The flat is on the 5th floor with elevator.
neighborhood_overview:
The tram station Feldeggstrasse is just around the corner.

From the airport: take the direct S-Bahn to Bahnhof Stadelhofen (18 min) then walk (10 min) or take the tram number 4 from Bellevue to Feldeggstrasse (2 min).

From the main station: take the tram number 4 from Bahnhofquai to Feldeggstrasse.

The apartment doesn't have a designed parking space, but there are a few options to park your car, the price is 35-45 CHF/day.
1. Covered car park : Parkhaus Utoquai: Färberstrasse 6, 8008 Zürich
2. Covered car park: Parkhaus Feldegg, Riesbachstrasse 7, 8008 Zürich
3. Covered car park: Parkhaus Zürichhorn, Dufourstrasse 142, Zürich
4. You also can park your car on a white zone with parking meter (5 CHF/2 hours)
5. I can also arrange a parking space for you, feel free to ask me, the price is 20 CHF/day

name: Blueground | Altstetten, storage & w/d, nr market
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this charming two bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 9, Altstetten home . (ID #ZRH78)
neighborhood_overview: Historic Altstetten is part of Zürich's 9th district, and there is plenty to do and see. The neighborhood is home to a variety of bars and restaurants as well as several high-end international hotels. Altstetten was once a city in its own right, but was incorporated into Zürich proper in 1934. Nearby highlights include the Museum für Gestaltung Zürich, where you can marvel at 19th and 20th century posters and everyday design objects, and the Schweizer Finanzmuseum. Altstetten is served by several IR train lines.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Urban Oasis with Queen Bed and City View (BE-32)
description: Welcome to our charming studio, a cozy retreat nestled in the heart of the city. This stylish space offers a comfortable double bed, modern amenities, and a prime location for exploring the vibrant surroundings. Ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking a compact yet inviting urban escape. Enjoy the convenience of nearby attractions, trendy bars, and easy access to public transportation. Make your stay memorable in this intimate hideaway that balances comfort and city living seamlessly.
neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of our city-centric location. Our studio is nestled in the trendy Kreis 3 district, just minutes away from Löwenplatz and Bahnhofplatz/HB. Explore the hip bars, cozy cafes, and diverse dining options right outside your door. Convenience is key with a Coop, pharmacy, and Grand Café Lochergut steps away. Excellent public transportation links from Lochergut tram station (2 and 3) make it easy to discover the city's charm. Experience the perfect blend of urban living and local amenities in this lively neighborhood.
host_about:
Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

We specialize in providing serviced apartments that are ideal for both short-term and long-term stays, and we offer a range of options to meet the unique needs of each client. From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

neighborhood_overview: The modern EMA House Serviced Apartments in Zurich's Seefeld neighbourhood are located in the immediate proximity of Lake Zurich. In harmony with the surroundings, the furnished apartments are also designed to meet the highest standards - from studios to 1-bedroom apartments. Seefeld is considered an expat hotspot in Zurich and therefore offers an international-style home for all those planning a lengthy stay in the city - whether on a business or private trip.
host_about: Mehr Platz, mehr Flexibilität und mehr Privatsphäre als ein herkömmliches Hotelzimmer: Mit diesen Vorzügen eignen sich die EMA House Serviced Apartments vor allem für Gäste, die länger als nur eine Nacht verweilen möchten. Wählen Sie aus unserem grossen Angebot erlesener Apartments an Zürichs begehrtesten Lagen, inklusive persönlichem «Apart Service Silver Paket». name: Fully Refurbished apartment 22
description:
Newly renovated studio close to the lake.
Located in a magnificent Neo-Baroque-style building from the year 1896.
A 2-minute walk from the FIFA museum.
5 mins walk to Zurich lake to Enge Swimming area beach (full of bars, restaurants)
The largest park in Zurich (Rieterpark) with gorgeous views of mountains & a museum inside is in front of the studio.
A few min walk to the old town center.
There is 1 big double bed for 2 people, 2 extra floor mattresses for the 3rd person & the 4th person
host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team
