name: THE FLAG Zürich - Loft Premium on the Rooftop
description:
Corner Loft on top floor (30 sqm) with double bed (2x 90cm) and 180° view
Floor to Ceilinig Windows, big private terrace with view over Zurich
Shower/WC, Hair dryer, Bathrobe/Slippers
Fully equipped Kitchenette (without hob), Fridge, Nespresso machine including equipment of coffee and tea capsules, Kettle
Free water bottle on arrival
Seating Area, Safe, Flatscreen TV, Ironing Station
Free W-Lan, Digital E-Concierge, Free access to digital Newspapers,
Free access to fitness room
Breakfast 20.00
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

description:

Zurich Central Station is within walking distance. The apartment does not leave any wishes open and is equipped with everything you need.

Ich bin Zürich aufgewachsen und arbeite als Immobilienbewirtschafter. In der Freizeit treibe ich viel Sport und geniesse die Zeit in der Natur.
Als Gastgeber ist es mir wichtig, dass ihr euch in meiner Wohnung wohl fühlt. Erreichbar bin ich zu jeder Zeit, einfach melden bei weiteren Fragen.

Bis bald
Dragi

name: Cozy Studio Apartment
description: Welcome to my studio apartment in lovely Zurich. The fully stocked kitchen, washing machine, and TV provide all the comforts of home. You'll be close to Sihlcity, the beautiful lake of Zurich, and Museum Rietberg. With cafes and restaurants nearby, and many public parks including Sukkulenten-Sammlung and Belvoirpark, you'll find plenty to explore.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the charming Kreis 2 neighborhood of Zurich, situated on the left bank of Lake Zurich.

For those seeking activities and attractions in Zurich, this is the places to be. With its lush greenery, Kreis 2 is often referred to as the "lung of the city." From the Entlisberg and Leimbach forests to the Mythenquai city pool, there are plenty of green spaces to explore. For a cozy picnic or a morning yoga session, I recommend the Rieterpark, which is home to the Rietberg Museum and its impressive collection of non-European art.

Vintage lovers will find paradise at Barbar Vintage, a store that has been around since 1974. Previously located in Niederdörfli, the shop is now conveniently located near the Enge train station. Here, you can find a well-curated selection of vintage fashion.
host_about:
My name is Kathrin, and I am excited to share my passion for travel and exploration with you. I have lived in 5 different countries and have traveled to many more.

As a self-proclaimed foodie, I love trying new cuisines and exploring local food scenes wherever I go. I believe that food is a wonderful way to experience a new place and get to know the local culture.

description:

The apartment hosts up to 4 guests with a spacious King Size bed (180*200 cm) and a comfortable sofa bed (140*200 cm). You'll love the 7 Wonders of Switzerland posters and text that add cultural and aesthetic value.
We take pride in offering a warm and welcoming experience.
neighborhood_overview:

10 minutes walking from the main train station or 2 tram stops. Very close to ETH.

host_about:
As a lifelong professional in the hotel industry, I've always had a passion for providing excellent hospitality and creating memorable experiences for my guests. I'm thrilled to bring that same passion to my role as an Airbnb host.

My love of travel has taken me all over the world, and I understand the importance of having a comfortable and welcoming place to stay. That's why I take great care to create a space that offers all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay in Zurich.

As your host, my top priority is making sure you have a great experience during your stay. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, I'm always available to answer any questions you may have or provide recommendations for things to see and do in the city.

I'm excited to welcome you and show you all that Zurich has to offer.

name: Urban Oasis with Queen Bed and City View (BE-33)
description: Welcome to our charming studio, a cozy retreat nestled in the heart of the city. This stylish space offers a comfortable double bed, modern amenities, and a prime location for exploring the vibrant surroundings. Ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking a compact yet inviting urban escape. Enjoy the convenience of nearby attractions, trendy bars, and easy access to public transportation. Make your stay memorable in this intimate hideaway that balances comfort and city living seamlessly.
neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of our city-centric location. Our studio is nestled in the trendy Kreis 3 district, just minutes away from Löwenplatz and Bahnhofplatz/HB. Explore the hip bars, cozy cafes, and diverse dining options right outside your door. Convenience is key with a Coop, pharmacy, and Grand Café Lochergut steps away. Excellent public transportation links from Lochergut tram station (2 and 3) make it easy to discover the city's charm. Experience the perfect blend of urban living and local amenities in this lively neighborhood.
host_about:
Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

We specialize in providing serviced apartments that are ideal for both short-term and long-term stays, and we offer a range of options to meet the unique needs of each client. From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

Welcome to this spacious and quietly located accommodation right in the heart of Zurich! This charming Airbnb listing has everything your heart desires, from a modern, well-equipped kitchen and a cosy sofa and flat-screen TV.

With such a central location in the old town, close to the river and in the pedestrian area, there is no better place than Zurich to explore the city, work for a time and enjoy the beauty of Switzerland. In addition, the cog railway to the university and Zurichberg is just around the corner, and it's worth trying.

With such a central address in the pedestrian zone of the old town, near the river, there's no better place than Zurich to experience the city, work for a while, and savor all that Switzerland has to offer. Additionally, the cogwheel train to the University and Zurichberg is just around the corner, providing a unique experience worth trying out.

name: Beautiful, Cozy & Zen House in Zurich
description:
A beautiful cozy house in central Zurich and close to everything.
Located in Milchubuck right next to Irchel Park and surrounded by trees you can hear the birds sing at any time of the day.
You will find everything you need in the house to enjoy a fun and great stay in our city.
The house is fully equipped and clean but mostly it is impatiently waiting to host you.
Feel at home, feel at ease, and most importantly enjoy your stay. I am available at any time, so do not hesitate to reach out.
neighborhood_overview:
The Neighborhood is beautiful. One of Zurich's nicest parks is just 2 minutes away. The park is green and has a small lake with a great sunset view. You can also go for runs or for a picnic (You will find grilling stations in the park if you are up for a barbecue). If you are a sports lover, there are tennis fields that you can rent in the park as well as a big cute outdoor rock for those who like to climb as well as a station for doing calisthenics and a great track to run that goes through the woods.
You will also find everything you need close by from gas station to pharmacy as well as a supermarket, cafe, italian restaurant, thai restaurant, chinese restaurant and many more restaurants that are all around 2 to 5 minutes walk from the house.
Supermarket coop is 2 minutes away. Denner is about 5 minutes away.
In the direction of Denner there is Kaferberg a lovely hill to catch the sunset and a great view on the city. In Kaferberg you will find great woods that are a na
host_about:
Hey Everyone,
I'm Tamer and people call me Tamtam. I currently have this lovely flat in Zurich that is more then ready to host you and your wonderful Zurich experiences.
Over the years I studied Econonics and Finance while working in Banking. Only nowadays, I am an entrepreunerial retail investor that is planning to open a Juice Bar called Fruit Kong and an environmental NGO called The Lebanese Social Fund. To make it shorter, I am working to reach my dreams.
I look forward to meeting you all ! You will love the house !

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, w/d & storage room, nr tram
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this one bedroom apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. with balcony views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this airy Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, charming living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH93)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Cozy Studio Apartment 11 in Center of Zurich
description: Discover Zurich from our perfectly located, stylish and well-equipped studio apartment. Apartment is located in Zurich’s charming old town (Niederdorf) and a five minute walk to the main train station, shopping on the famous Bahnhofstrasse, lake Zurich or the internationally renowned Kunsthaus museum. Unwind and explore the best of Zurich from this stylish retreat!
neighborhood_overview:
Step outside and immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere of Niederdorfli. This historic neighborhood is known for its vibrant nightlife, bustling cafes, and charming cobblestone streets. Indulge in the local culinary scene by visiting the numerous restaurants and cafes that line the streets, offering a variety of cuisines to suit every taste.

For those seeking cultural experiences, you'll be delighted to find yourself surrounded by museums, art galleries, and theaters. Take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Kunsthaus Zurich or explore the rich history of the city at the Swiss National Museum.

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood surrounding Turi offers a dynamic and diverse experience. This bustling area is known for its vibrant atmosphere and convenient location. Schöneggstr. itself is a lively street lined with charming cafes, trendy boutiques, and local shops, adding to the neighbourhood's appeal. Just a short walk away, you'll find the picturesque Lake Zurich, where you can enjoy leisurely walks along the promenade or indulge in various water activities. The neighbourhood is also home to cultural landmarks, including the iconic Bahnhofstrasse, renowned for its luxury shopping and fine dining establishments. With excellent public transportation connections, residents and visitors can easily explore Zurich's museums, galleries, and historical sites. Overall, Turi offers an ideal neighbourhood setting, combining convenience, cultural attractions, and a vibrant atmosphere that perfectly captures the essence of Zurich's charm.

name: Locke Room with Balcony at Locke am Platz
description: You'll also have your own contemporary bathroom with a bath and bespoke Kinsey Apothecary toiletries. There’s no kitchen, but you can stock up on treats from local eateries or head down stairs to our restaurant. And you'll have a mini bar fridge to store any leftovers. neighborhood_overview:
Lakeside. Leafy. Laidback. That’s how we’d describe Zurich’s Enge quarter. With its lush green spaces hugging the banks of Lake Zurich, the area is a haven for swimmers, wanderers, and cyclists. Find historical villas, open-air pools, botanical gardens and picnic-ready parks. Then get your culture fix at the Museum Rietberg (or the FIFA Museum, if that’s your jam).

Enge’s down-to-earth vibe is a welcome break from the city centre, yet it’s home to loads of businesses, the Kongresshaus, and you can hop on a train to the airport or Zurich HB in no time.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, storage & w/d, nr market
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this cozy studio Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 3, Wiedikon home . (ID #ZRH106)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Very nice and bright apartment in the city center.
The flat is 78 sqm on the mezzanine floor.

There are also 2 bathrooms: one with shower and sink and the other one with toilet and sink.
The living room is bright and sunny, the kitchen is fully equipped.

name: Blueground | Oerlikon, storage & w/d, nr tram
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this bright one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 11, Oerlikon home with stunning balcony views over the city. (ID #ZRH111)
neighborhood_overview: Busy Oerlikon is a convenient neighborhood in the northern part of Zürich where there's no shortage of things to do. One important landmark is the Hallenstadion, an arena that hosts concerts and sports events. Other local highlights include the Kunsteisbahn Oerlikon skating rink and Theater 11 Zürich, where you can catch a traveling Broadway show. The neighborhood is also the setting for the city's sprawling Messe Zürich exhibition center, a busy meeting space that's surrounded by a variety of shops and restaurants. The Zürich Oerlikon train station is a major hub, making it easy to get around the city and further afield.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

The apartment is located above the Longstreet Bar/Club which is closed from Sunday - Wednesday.

Langstrasse is an exciting and diverse neighborhood in Zurich that offers everything your heart desires. Here are some reasons why you should stay in our neighborhood:

Lively nightlife: Langstrasse is famous for its vibrant nightlife. Discover a plethora of bars, clubs, and pubs where you can party late into the night.
Cultural diversity: The neighborhood is a melting pot of different cultures, offering a wide range of international cuisine. Try delicious dishes from around the world at the numerous restaurants and food stalls.
Shopping paradise: Whether you're looking for vintage treasures, designer boutiques, or concept stores, Langstrasse has something for every shopper.
Art and creativity: This area is known for its artistic atmosphere. Discover galleries, street art, and innovative art projects at every corner.

name: Blueground | Altstetten, private w/d, nr shopping
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this one bedroom apartment in District 9, Altstetten. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH117)
neighborhood_overview: Historic Altstetten is part of Zürich's 9th district, and there is plenty to do and see. The neighborhood is home to a variety of bars and restaurants as well as several high-end international hotels. Altstetten was once a city in its own right, but was incorporated into Zürich proper in 1934. Nearby highlights include the Museum für Gestaltung Zürich, where you can marvel at 19th and 20th century posters and everyday design objects, and the Schweizer Finanzmuseum. Altstetten is served by several IR train lines.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

description: Welcome to our charming studio, a cozy retreat nestled in the heart of the city. This stylish space offers a comfortable double bed, modern amenities, and a prime location for exploring the vibrant surroundings. neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of our city-centric location. Our studio is nestled in the trendy Kreis 3 district, just minutes away from Löwenplatz and Bahnhofplatz/HB. Explore the hip bars, cozy cafes, and diverse dining options right outside your door. Convenience is key with a Coop, pharmacy, and Grand Café Lochergut steps away. Excellent public transportation links from Lochergut tram station (2 and 3) make it easy to discover the city's charm. Experience the perfect blend of urban living and local amenities in this lively neighborhood.
host_about:
Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

name: Blueground | Oerlikon, storage & w/d, nr tram
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this spacious District 11, Oerlikon furnished one bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and roomy living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH122)
neighborhood_overview: Busy Oerlikon is a convenient neighborhood in the northern part of Zürich where there's no shortage of things to do. One important landmark is the Hallenstadion, an arena that hosts concerts and sports events. Other local highlights include the Kunsteisbahn Oerlikon skating rink and Theater 11 Zürich, where you can catch a traveling Broadway show. The neighborhood is also the setting for the city's sprawling Messe Zürich exhibition center, a busy meeting space that's surrounded by a variety of shops and restaurants. The Zürich Oerlikon train station is a major hub, making it easy to get around the city and further afield.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Urban Oasis with Queen Bed and City View (BE-44)
description: Welcome to our charming studio, a cozy retreat nestled in the heart of the city. This stylish space offers a comfortable double bed, modern amenities, and a prime location for exploring the vibrant surroundings. Ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking a compact yet inviting urban escape. Enjoy the convenience of nearby attractions, trendy bars, and easy access to public transportation. Make your stay memorable in this intimate hideaway that balances comfort and city living seamlessly.
neighborhood_overview: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of our city-centric location. Our studio is nestled in the trendy Kreis 3 district, just minutes away from Löwenplatz and Bahnhofplatz/HB. Explore the hip bars, cozy cafes, and diverse dining options right outside your door. Convenience is key with a Coop, pharmacy, and Grand Café Lochergut steps away. Excellent public transportation links from Lochergut tram station (2 and 3) make it easy to discover the city's charm. Experience the perfect blend of urban living and local amenities in this lively neighborhood.

Our real estate company is a leading provider of serviced apartments solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional services to our clients. With a focus on providing high-quality, fully-furnished apartments that offer all the comforts of home, we have become a trusted name in the industry.

From luxury apartments in prime locations to more affordable options, we have something to suit every budget and preference.

Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring that our clients have a seamless and enjoyable experience. We understand that our clients have busy lives, and we are committed to making their stay with us as comfortable and convenient as possible.

Whether you are a corporate traveler, a family on vacation, or anyone in between, we are here to provide you with the perfect serviced apartment solution. With a focus on quality and service, we are dedicated to ensuring that our clients have the best possible experience, every time.

name: Big 1BR apartment in the center (Mill 3.55)
description:
This flat features a balcony and is ideally situated in Zürich, just 600 metres from Bellevueplatz and under 1 km from Grossmünster. It is also conveniently located less than 1 km from Fraumünster and is accessible via lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property, with Zurich Opera House just 500 metres away.

The 1-bedroom apartment includes a spacious living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven, and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer.
host_about:
The comfortable furnished apartments of PABS Résidences + Appartements AG in central Zurich can be easily booked within few minutes. Their comfort is very attractive, the rents are fair and "all inclusive". For 26 years now, PABS Résidences + Appartments AG has been helping private and corporate clients find furnished apartments and residences to rent in the centre of Zurich. PABS Résidences + Appartements AG is also the leading contact for relocation companies and people who are moving to Zurich temporarily.

Beautiful and modern furnished apartments in the heart of Zurich
If you plan to stay in Zurich for longer than 14 days, you can browse through our 250 low-priced apartments on this home page under "Apartment search".

Comfortable, furnished rental apartments: great value to suit your every need:
A wide range of apartments in the Zurich city centre and all central city districts.
Full service with a central, competent contact person for advice, reservations, rental contracts, check-in and check-out.
Booking, checking in and checking out all take just a few minutes – saving you plenty of time.
All-inclusive, first-rate services (weekly cleaning thanks to our cleaning staff, repair service, emergency service 24/24).
Information is constantly updated. Simply download the iOS App or follow our social media pages (see links on this page).
With its wide selection of 250 furnished apartments in Zurich, PABS Résidences und Appartements AG offers you a great deal of choice. The standard minimum rental period for furnished apartments is one month. A furnished apartment is usually available for last minute bookings for rental periods of 14 days or longer.

At PABS Ltd., we provide you with comprehensive information and a list of furnished apartments in Zurich with plenty of great value offers (by telephone or email). Our standard apartments include: a modern, well-equipped kitchen, TV, appliances and household infrastructure as well as fresh sheets and towels. The rental price for all apartments includes the costs for electricity, water and heating, TV, weekly cleaning and laundry service.

Our top priority at PABS Ltd. is making sure that our clients are satisfied with the apartments they rent.

name: Heart of Zurich Modern Studio (HG7)
description: Welcome to our Studio, nestled in the heart of Zurich! Once you enter, you will experience the blend of modern comfort and urban convenience. Our studios are meticulously designed to ensure a memorable stay. Enjoy the ease of access to Zurich's vibrant life while indulging in the tranquility of your private, well-equipped retreat. Whether you're here for culture, business, or relaxation, our central location ensures you're always in the midst of it all. Discover your Zurich home away from home.
neighborhood_overview:
Hirschengraben in Zurich is a notable area that serves as a gateway to a wealth of historical, cultural, and recreational opportunities within the city. Its proximity to the central parts of Zurich, including the main train station, the university, and key shopping and dining venues, makes it an ideal starting point for exploring the city's rich offerings.

Historical and Cultural Highlights

The area around Hirschengraben is steeped in history and culture. The University of Zurich and the ETH Zurich are prestigious institutions that not only contribute to the city's academic prestige but also offer various public events, lectures, and exhibitions. The proximity to the Old Town allows visitors to immerse themselves in Zurich's medieval history, wandering through narrow alleys, admiring centuries-old buildings, and visiting landmarks like the Grossmünster and Fraumünster churches, which are known for their stunning architecture and stained glass windows.

description:
Terrific 2BR apartment in the city centre, very close to Paradeplatz!
The flat has 2 bedrooms: 1st bedroom with double bed and 2nd bedroom with twin single beds (90x200cm).

The bathroom is with shower.

A lot of nice restaurants and bars on walking distance.

description: Welcome to our straightforward 2-bedroom apartment in Zurich, just 19 minutes from the city center. Perfect for exploring Zurich or as a hassle-free residence, our apartment accommodates up to 5 people, making it your ideal base.
neighborhood_overview:
Situated in a peaceful yet convenient, this apartment offers the perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility. Despite being a mere 19-minute journey from the bustling heart of Zurich's city center, the neighborhood itself is a haven of calm, boasting a variety of amenities that ensure a comfortable and convenient stay.

Guests will find themselves in close proximity to a selection of shops and supermarkets, making daily essentials easily accessible. For dining out, a variety of restaurants cater to a range of tastes and budgets, offering both local Swiss cuisine and international dishes. Whether you're looking for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, you'll find something to suit your needs just a short walk or a quick public transport ride away.

The area also benefits from its accessibility to several public transport options, connecting guests to wider Zurich and beyond. This blend of residential peace, along with the practicality of having life's necessities a

We turn temporarily vacant properties into contemporary furnished short-term rental apartments. 

Our apartments shall be functional and clean at a fair rate and our team can be reached 24/7 in order to assist you with anything you might need. 

Stay in our apartments without being guilty of contributing to gentrification. Our apartments are not being rented from the regular market to be let as furnished apartments. Properties we use are temporary empty and instead of staying empty are being furnished & rented to you for a limited amount of time.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, private w/d, near shops
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this charming one bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 3, Wiedikon home . (ID #ZRH146)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this two bedroom apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. . (ID #ZRH149)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

neighborhood_overview: Enge is nestled between the Limmat River and Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood is part of Zürich's 2nd district. This tiny area packs in a lot to see and do. Enge is home to the FIFA World Football Museum and the Museum Rietberg, a 19th century villa that now displays non-European artworks. There are also several parks to enjoy: heavily landscaped Reiter Park recalls the glamorous of a bygone age while lakeside Belvoirpark is perfect for a picnic or morning jog. You can find everything from fast food to traditional Swiss cuisine to sushi in Enge. The neighborhood is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn trains.

name: Blueground | Enge, shared w/d, nr market, Old Town
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this two bedroom apartment in District 2, Enge. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, lovely living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH153)
neighborhood_overview: Enge is nestled between the Limmat River and Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood is part of Zürich's 2nd district. This tiny area packs in a lot to see and do. Enge is home to the FIFA World Football Museum and the Museum Rietberg, a 19th century villa that now displays non-European artworks. There are also several parks to enjoy: heavily landscaped Reiter Park recalls the glamorous of a bygone age while lakeside Belvoirpark is perfect for a picnic or morning jog. You can find everything from fast food to traditional Swiss cuisine to sushi in Enge. The neighborhood is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn trains.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Blueground | Unterstrass, nr university, groceries
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this studio apartment in District 6, Unterstrass. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, charming living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH155)
neighborhood_overview: Unterstrass comprises part of Zurich's sixth district and stretches north from the city center. This vast area was an independent municipality before being incorporated into Zurich in 1893. The neighborhood is home to the Irchelpark campus of the University of Zurich -- not to be confused with Irchel Park, a lovely greenspace that is open to the public. Unterstrass is also the setting for Schindlergut and Beckenhof, two city parks that offer gorgeous Limmat views. There's a variety of both Swiss and international cuisine on offer, including Thai and Mexican food as well as pizza. Unterstrass is served by several bus and tram lines.

name: Blueground | Seefeld, near opera, 1 min to lake
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this beautiful studio Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 8, Seefeld home with stunning views over the city. (ID #ZRH157)
neighborhood_overview: Seefeld is situated along the east bank of Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood comprises part of the city's 8th district. The best part of living in this area is the gorgeous lakeside promenade. You can picnic, swim, and enjoy Alpine views at Zürichhorn, a lovely park. Another popular attraction is Chinagarten Zürich, a lakeside garden with Chinese pavilions and plantings. Seefeld has an interesting food scene, with everything from casual outdoor dining with lake views to traditional Italian on offer. There are also cocktail bars and coffee houses where you can kick back and relax. Seefeld is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn train system.

host_about:
The comfortable furnished apartments of PABS Résidences + Appartements AG in central Zurich can be easily booked within few minutes. Their comfort is very attractive, the rents are fair and "all inclusive". For 26 years now, PABS Résidences + Appartments AG has been helping private and corporate clients find furnished apartments and residences to rent in the centre of Zurich. PABS Résidences + Appartements AG is also the leading contact for relocation companies and people who are moving to Zurich temporarily.

Beautiful and modern furnished apartments in the heart of Zurich
If you plan to stay in Zurich for longer than 14 days, you can browse through our 250 low-priced apartments on this home page under "Apartment search".

Comfortable, furnished rental apartments: great value to suit your every need:
A wide range of apartments in the Zurich city centre and all central city districts.
Full service with a central, competent contact person for advice, reservations, rental contracts, check-in and check-out.
Booking, checking in and checking out all take just a few minutes – saving you plenty of time.
All-inclusive, first-rate services (weekly cleaning thanks to our cleaning staff, repair service, emergency service 24/24).
Information is constantly updated. Simply download the iOS App or follow our social media pages (see links on this page).
With its wide selection of 250 furnished apartments in Zurich, PABS Résidences und Appartements AG offers you a great deal of choice. The standard minimum rental period for furnished apartments is one month. A furnished apartment is usually available for last minute bookings for rental periods of 14 days or longer.

At PABS Ltd., we provide you with comprehensive information and a list of furnished apartments in Zurich with plenty of great value offers (by telephone or email). Our standard apartments include: a modern, well-equipped kitchen, TV, appliances and household infrastructure as well as fresh sheets and towels. The rental price for all apartments includes the costs for electricity, water and heating, TV, weekly cleaning and laundry service.

Our top priority at PABS Ltd. is making sure that our clients are satisfied with the apartments they rent.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, private w/d, near train
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this one bedroom apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, lovely living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH154)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Blueground | Enge, storage, near local market
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this two bedroom apartment in District 2, Enge. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, comfortable living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH159)
neighborhood_overview: Enge is nestled between the Limmat River and Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood is part of Zürich's 2nd district. This tiny area packs in a lot to see and do. Enge is home to the FIFA World Football Museum and the Museum Rietberg, a 19th century villa that now displays non-European artworks. There are also several parks to enjoy: heavily landscaped Reiter Park recalls the glamorous of a bygone age while lakeside Belvoirpark is perfect for a picnic or morning jog. You can find everything from fast food to traditional Swiss cuisine to sushi in Enge. The neighborhood is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn trains.

name: Blueground | Wipkingen, nr river, market
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely District 10, Wipkingen furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and roomy living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH135)
neighborhood_overview: Serene Wipkingen is one of the quarters of Zürich's tenth district. Set along the Limmat River, this dynamic area is ideal for new arrivals to the city. There are a variety of cafes, bars and restaurants near the riverbank, including everything from regional French cuisine to pizza to Indian barbecue. There is also a supermarket in Wipkingen for anyone who prefers to self cater. Several museums, including the National Finance Museum, and a cinema are a short walk from Wipkingen. The neighborhood is served by several tram and bus lines as well as local and regional rail from Zürich Wipkingen train station.

name: Charming 1 BR unit in Zurich
description:
Welcome to our charming 1-bedroom apartment. This cozy home is perfect for individuals or couples looking for a comfortable and convenient stay in the heart of Zürich.

The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living room with a dining area, and a small working space ideal for remote work or study. Enjoy our private patio/balcony with an amazing greenery view, perfect for relaxing with a morning coffee or unwinding in the evening. Whether you're here to explore the city or rel
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a pleasant and well-regarded neighborhood in Zurich. Known for its charming mix of shops, restaurants, and cultural attractions, the area provides a welcoming and enjoyable atmosphere. The streets are peaceful and lined with trees, showcasing the city's delightful architecture and a touch of its rich history.

Close to the lake and several parks, the neighborhood offers plenty of opportunities for relaxing walks and outdoor activities. The convenient public transportation system makes it easy to explore other parts of Zurich, enhancing your stay with seamless access to the city’s various attractions.

While not overly luxurious, this area offers a comfortable and enjoyable lifestyle, making it a great base for your visit to Zurich.
host_about:
We turn temporarily vacant properties into contemporary furnished short-term rental apartments. 

Our apartments shall be functional and clean at a fair rate and our team can be reached 24/7 in order to assist you with anything you might need. 

Stay in our apartments without being guilty of contributing to gentrification. Our apartments are not being rented from the regular market to be let as furnished apartments. Properties we use are temporary empty and instead of staying empty are being furnished & rented to you for a limited amount of time.

host_about:

I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: Cozy Zurich Apt with Lockbox access
description: Welcome to our basic yet cozy apartment in the heart of Zürich. Located at Drahtzugstrasse, our apartment is perfect for travelers looking for a simple, comfortable stay. The neighborhood offers easy access to public transportation, making it convenient to explore the city. With 2 bedrooms, a well-equipped kitchen, and a comfortable living room, this apartment has everything you need for a pleasant stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled within Zurich's vibrant residential hub, this apartment enjoys a sought-after location with local conveniences right at your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the picturesque charm of the neighborhood, graced with delightful old townhouses that invite leisurely strolls. Within a minute's walk, you'll discover an array of dining options, cozy cafes, and even a pharmacy.

Exploring Zurich is a breeze with nearby tram and bus stops offering seamless transportation. The glistening lake awaits just a leisurely 12-minute stroll away, while iconic attractions like the art museum and botanical garden are a mere 10-minute walk from the apartment.

Beyond its immediate allure, the neighborhood exudes a serene ambiance, creating a tranquil haven for guests in search of relaxation. Prepare for a rejuvenating and delightful stay in the calm, peaceful atmosphere of this remarkable location.
host_about:
We turn temporarily vacant properties into contemporary furnished short-term rental apartments. 

Our apartments shall be functional and clean at a fair rate and our team can be reached 24/7 in order to assist you with anything you might need. 

Stay in our apartments without being guilty of contributing to gentrification. Our apartments are not being rented from the regular market to be let as furnished apartments. Properties we use are temporary empty and instead of staying empty are being furnished & rented to you for a limited amount of time.

description:
Welcome to our serene apartment in a peaceful Zürich neighborhood, perfect for short-term getaways and extended stays. This fully furnished retreat offers a comfortable, relaxing ambiance.

A short walk from two tram lines, you'll have quick access to Zürich’s city center in 15-20 minutes. Inside, you’ll find two spacious bedrooms with luxurious double beds (160x200cm), ensuring a restful night after exploring Zürich.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is nestled in a peaceful area just outside the hustle and bustle of central Zürich. This tranquil neighborhood offers a relaxing retreat while still being conveniently close to the city's attractions.
A short walk from the apartment brings you to Coffee & Deeds, a delightful café cherished by locals for its cozy atmosphere and excellent coffee. For sports enthusiasts, the training grounds of the Zürich Football Team (FC Zürich) are also nearby, providing an interesting peek into local sports culture.
Shopping lovers will appreciate the proximity to Glattzentrum, one of Zürich's largest shopping centers, just a few minutes away. It’s a great spot for a leisurely day of shopping and dining.
When you're ready to explore the heart of Zürich, two tram lines are at your service, offering direct routes to the city center in just 15-20 minutes. This makes it easy to access all the vibrant energy and attractions that Zürich has to offer, while still enjoying the pea

neighborhood_overview:
Situated in a peaceful neighborhood just outside of Zürich, our apartment offers a tranquil retreat while still being close to key attractions.
Within walking distance, you’ll discover the charming Coffee & Deeds café, a beloved spot among locals for its delightful ambiance and excellent brews. Sports enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to the training grounds of the Zürich Football Team (FC Zürich), just a short stroll away.
For those who enjoy shopping, the Glattzentrum, one of Zürich’s largest and most popular shopping centers, is nearby, offering a variety of shops and dining options.
When you’re ready to explore the heart of Zürich, two convenient tram lines can take you there in just 15-20 minutes, providing easy access to the city’s vibrant center.

description:
This apartment is located very centrally, in the Old Town of Zurich, in close to the Limmat River.

The tram stops Rathaus and Paradeplatz, can be reached in a couple of minutes.
From Rathaus the Tram Nr.4 will take you to Tiefenbrunnen Station via Bellevue. Tram Nr.15 operates to Stadelhofen Station. From Paradeplatz a myriad of other tramlines operate.

The apartment is furnished modernly and comes witt a kitchenette. A small fridge and a microwave will be at your disposal.

name: Blueground | Seefeld, near lake, 3 stops to opera
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this one bedroom apartment in District 8, Seefeld. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this airy Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH158)
neighborhood_overview: Seefeld is situated along the east bank of Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood comprises part of the city's 8th district. The best part of living in this area is the gorgeous lakeside promenade. You can picnic, swim, and enjoy Alpine views at Zürichhorn, a lovely park. Another popular attraction is Chinagarten Zürich, a lakeside garden with Chinese pavilions and plantings. Seefeld has an interesting food scene, with everything from casual outdoor dining with lake views to traditional Italian on offer. There are also cocktail bars and coffee houses where you can kick back and relax. Seefeld is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn train system.

name: Blueground | Unterstrass, near Zurich HB, tram
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish District 6, Unterstrass furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and roomy living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH161)
neighborhood_overview: Unterstrass comprises part of Zurich's sixth district and stretches north from the city center. This vast area was an independent municipality before being incorporated into Zurich in 1893. The neighborhood is home to the Irchelpark campus of the University of Zurich -- not to be confused with Irchel Park, a lovely greenspace that is open to the public. Unterstrass is also the setting for Schindlergut and Beckenhof, two city parks that offer gorgeous Limmat views. There's a variety of both Swiss and international cuisine on offer, including Thai and Mexican food as well as pizza. Unterstrass is served by several bus and tram lines.

name: Cozy 1-Bed Apartment in Zürich
description: Welcome to our cozy apartment located in the heart of Zürich. This basic but comfortable apartment features one bedroom with a double bed (160x200 cm), a living room that includes a sofa bed, a dining table with three seats, and a working desk. The apartment also has a fully equipped kitchen with all the essentials and a bathroom with a bathtub and shower. Ideal for travelers seeking a practical and straightforward stay in Zürich.
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled within Zurich's vibrant residential hub, this apartment enjoys a sought-after location with local conveniences right at your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the picturesque charm of the neighborhood, graced with delightful old townhouses that invite leisurely strolls. Within a minute's walk, you'll discover an array of dining options, cozy cafes, and even a pharmacy.

Exploring Zurich is a breeze with nearby tram and bus stops offering seamless transportation. The glistening lake awaits just a leisurely 12-minute stroll away, while iconic attractions like the art museum and botanical garden are a mere 10-minute walk from the apartment.

Beyond its immediate allure, the neighborhood exudes a serene ambiance, creating a tranquil haven for guests in search of relaxation. Prepare for a rejuvenating and delightful stay in the calm, peaceful atmosphere of this remarkable location.

description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this three bedroom apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this elegantly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH164)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

host_about:
Hi

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, blcny, elev, w/d, nr market
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this studio apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this airy Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, lovely living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH171)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

The comfortable furnished apartments of PABS Résidences + Appartements AG in central Zurich can be easily booked within few minutes. Their comfort is very attractive, the rents are fair and "all inclusive". For 26 years now, PABS Résidences + Appartments AG has been helping private and corporate clients find furnished apartments and residences to rent in the centre of Zurich. PABS Résidences + Appartements AG is also the leading contact for relocation companies and people who are moving to Zurich temporarily.

Beautiful and modern furnished apartments in the heart of Zurich
If you plan to stay in Zurich for longer than 14 days, you can browse through our 250 low-priced apartments on this home page under "Apartment search".

Comfortable, furnished rental apartments: great value to suit your every need:
A wide range of apartments in the Zurich city centre and all central city districts.
Full service with a central, competent contact person for advice, reservations, rental contracts, check-in and check-out.
Booking, checking in and checking out all take just a few minutes – saving you plenty of time.
All-inclusive, first-rate services (weekly cleaning thanks to our cleaning staff, repair service, emergency service 24/24).

With its wide selection of 250 furnished apartments in Zurich, PABS Résidences und Appartements AG offers you a great deal of choice. At PABS Ltd., we provide you with comprehensive information and a list of furnished apartments in Zurich with plenty of great value offers (by telephone or email). description: Welcome to our basic 1BR apartment located in Zurich, Switzerland. Perfectly positioned for easy access to Zurich's main attractions, this apartment offers a comfortable stay with all the necessary amenities. Enjoy the convenience of nearby public transportation, making it easy to explore Zurich's vibrant neighborhoods and cultural hotspots. neighborhood_overview:
Nestled within Zurich's vibrant residential hub, this apartment enjoys a sought-after location with local conveniences right at your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the picturesque charm of the neighborhood, graced with delightful old townhouses that invite leisurely strolls. Within a minute's walk, you'll discover an array of dining options, cozy cafes, and even a pharmacy.

Exploring Zurich is a breeze with nearby tram and bus stops offering seamless transportation. The glistening lake awaits just a leisurely 12-minute stroll away, while iconic attractions like the art museum and botanical garden are a mere 10-minute walk from the apartment.

Beyond its immediate allure, the neighborhood exudes a serene ambiance, creating a tranquil haven for guests in search of relaxation. Prepare for a rejuvenating and delightful stay in the calm, peaceful atmosphere of this remarkable location.

name: Blueground | Seefeld, elev, balcony, 3 min to lake
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this two bedroom apartment in District 8, Seefeld. with balcony views over the city. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this airy Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, charming living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH167)
neighborhood_overview: Seefeld is situated along the east bank of Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood comprises part of the city's 8th district. The best part of living in this area is the gorgeous lakeside promenade. You can picnic, swim, and enjoy Alpine views at Zürichhorn, a lovely park. Another popular attraction is Chinagarten Zürich, a lakeside garden with Chinese pavilions and plantings. Seefeld has an interesting food scene, with everything from casual outdoor dining with lake views to traditional Italian on offer. There are also cocktail bars and coffee houses where you can kick back and relax. Seefeld is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn train system.

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, balcony, w/d & elevator
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this charming District 3, Wiedikon furnished one bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and pretty living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Zurich has to offer! (ID #ZRH168)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.

name: Blueground | Hard, nr tram, restaurants & shops
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this one bedroom apartment in District 4, Hard. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, stylish living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH174)
neighborhood_overview: Hard is one of Zurich's up-and-coming neighborhoods, located west of the city center. The district is easily accessible on foot from the city's major attractions. Numerous cafes, restaurants, and two large supermarkets ensure culinary satisfaction. For sports enthusiasts, Hard offers the Hardau sports hall and a Crossfit fitness studio. To the south of Hard lies the impressive Letzigrund Stadium, with a capacity of 50,000 spectators. The neighborhood's green lung is the beautiful Bullingerhof Park. Hard is connected to the rest of the city via several bus, tram, and S-Bahn lines, with additional access to long-distance transportation through the Hardbrücke train station.

host_about:
The comfortable furnished apartments of PABS Résidences + Appartements AG in central Zurich can be easily booked within few minutes. Their comfort is very attractive, the rents are fair and "all inclusive". For 26 years now, PABS Résidences + Appartments AG has been helping private and corporate clients find furnished apartments and residences to rent in the centre of Zurich. PABS Résidences + Appartements AG is also the leading contact for relocation companies and people who are moving to Zurich temporarily.

Beautiful and modern furnished apartments in the heart of Zurich
If you plan to stay in Zurich for longer than 14 days, you can browse through our 250 low-priced apartments on this home page under "Apartment search".

Comfortable, furnished rental apartments: great value to suit your every need:
A wide range of apartments in the Zurich city centre and all central city districts.
Full service with a central, competent contact person for advice, reservations, rental contracts, check-in and check-out.
Booking, checking in and checking out all take just a few minutes – saving you plenty of time.
All-inclusive, first-rate services (weekly cleaning thanks to our cleaning staff, repair service, emergency service 24/24).
Information is constantly updated. Simply download the iOS App or follow our social media pages (see links on this page).
With its wide selection of 250 furnished apartments in Zurich, PABS Résidences und Appartements AG offers you a great deal of choice. The standard minimum rental period for furnished apartments is one month. A furnished apartment is usually available for last minute bookings for rental periods of 14 days or longer.

At PABS Ltd., we provide you with comprehensive information and a list of furnished apartments in Zurich with plenty of great value offers (by telephone or email). Our standard apartments include: a modern, well-equipped kitchen, TV, appliances and household infrastructure as well as fresh sheets and towels. The rental price for all apartments includes the costs for electricity, water and heating, TV, weekly cleaning and laundry service.

Our top priority at PABS Ltd. is making sure that our clients are satisfied with the apartments they rent.

neighborhood_overview: Serene Wipkingen is one of the quarters of Zürich's tenth district. Set along the Limmat River, this dynamic area is ideal for new arrivals to the city. There are a variety of cafes, bars and restaurants near the riverbank, including everything from regional French cuisine to pizza to Indian barbecue. There is also a supermarket in Wipkingen for anyone who prefers to self cater. Several museums, including the National Finance Museum, and a cinema are a short walk from Wipkingen. The neighborhood is served by several tram and bus lines as well as local and regional rail from Zürich Wipkingen train station.

Explore Zurich's Oerlikon neighborhood—a lively and diverse area that seamlessly blends residential, commercial, and cultural experiences. Here's a glimpse into the vibrant essence of this locale:

Oerlikon's Distinct Ambiance:

name: Blueground | Enge, balcony, w/d & elevator
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this bright three bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 2, Enge home . (ID #ZRH160)
neighborhood_overview: Enge is nestled between the Limmat River and Lake Zürich, and the neighborhood is part of Zürich's 2nd district. This tiny area packs in a lot to see and do. Enge is home to the FIFA World Football Museum and the Museum Rietberg, a 19th century villa that now displays non-European artworks. There are also several parks to enjoy: heavily landscaped Reiter Park recalls the glamorous of a bygone age while lakeside Belvoirpark is perfect for a picnic or morning jog. You can find everything from fast food to traditional Swiss cuisine to sushi in Enge. The neighborhood is served by several bus and tram lines as well as Zürich's S-Bahn trains.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Cozy Zurich Apartment with Easy Access
description: Welcome to our cozy apartment, just 21 minutes from Zurich city center. This well-appointed space features two bedrooms with double beds, a full bathroom with a bathtub and shower, and a spacious living room with a sofa bed and dining area. Perfect for families, couples, or small groups, the apartment blends comfort and convenience. With excellent public transport nearby, you can easily explore Zurich's attractions while enjoying a quiet neighborhood setting.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in Zurich's Oerlikon district, a neighborhood seamlessly blending local culture, modern convenience, and a vibrant atmosphere. Here's a snapshot of what the area has to offer:

Diverse Cultural Fusion: Oerlikon's community is a melting pot of local and international residents, creating a vibrant cultural blend. While lacking the historical charm of Zurich's Old Town, Oerlikon delivers a contemporary Swiss urban experience, combining Swiss efficiency with cosmopolitan living.

Shopping Variety: The neighborhood features a diverse range of shops, from supermarkets to boutiques and specialty stores, catering to everyday needs and offering unique Swiss products.

Dining Delights: Oerlikon boasts an array of bars and restaurants serving Swiss and international cuisine, along with trendy dining options. Whether you crave Swiss classics like fondue or want to embark on a global culinary journey, Oerlikon has something for every palate.
