name: Basic 1-Bedroom Zurich Stay with Sofa Bed
description: Welcome to our cozy apartment located in the heart of Zurich's charming district. This simple and practical apartment offers a peaceful retreat in a well-connected area, ideal for those seeking a comfortable stay with all the essentials. The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, a cozy living room with a sofa bed, and a dining table, perfect for a relaxed city escape. With convenient public transportation nearby, you'll have easy access to Zurich's main attraction and hidden gems.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a pleasant and well-regarded neighborhood in Zurich. Known for its charming mix of shops, restaurants, and cultural attractions, the area provides a welcoming and enjoyable atmosphere. The streets are peaceful and lined with trees, showcasing the city's delightful architecture and a touch of its rich history.

Close to the lake and several parks, the neighborhood offers plenty of opportunities for relaxing walks and outdoor activities. The convenient public transportation system makes it easy to explore other parts of Zurich, enhancing your stay with seamless access to the city’s various attractions.

While not overly luxurious, this area offers a comfortable and enjoyable lifestyle, making it a great base for your visit to Zurich.
host_about:
We turn temporarily vacant properties into contemporary furnished short-term rental apartments. 

Our apartments shall be functional and clean at a fair rate and our team can be reached 24/7 in order to assist you with anything you might need. 

Stay in our apartments without being guilty of contributing to gentrification. Our apartments are not being rented from the regular market to be let as furnished apartments. Properties we use are temporary empty and instead of staying empty are being furnished & rented to you for a limited amount of time.

name: Stylish 2BR near lake - Flower 3
description: Welcome to Flower 3, a stylish and modern 2-bedroom apartment located just a short stroll away from the beautiful Lake Zurich and the iconic Zurich Opera House. Situated in one of Zurich’s most desirable neighborhoods, this apartment combines comfort, elegance, and convenience.
host_about:
The comfortable furnished apartments of PABS Résidences + Appartements AG in central Zurich can be easily booked within few minutes. Their comfort is very attractive, the rents are fair and "all inclusive". For 26 years now, PABS Résidences + Appartments AG has been helping private and corporate clients find furnished apartments and residences to rent in the centre of Zurich. PABS Résidences + Appartements AG is also the leading contact for relocation companies and people who are moving to Zurich temporarily.

Beautiful and modern furnished apartments in the heart of Zurich
If you plan to stay in Zurich for longer than 14 days, you can browse through our 250 low-priced apartments on this home page under "Apartment search".

Comfortable, furnished rental apartments: great value to suit your every need:
A wide range of apartments in the Zurich city centre and all central city districts.
Full service with a central, competent contact person for advice, reservations, rental contracts, check-in and check-out.
Booking, checking in and checking out all take just a few minutes – saving you plenty of time.
All-inclusive, first-rate services (weekly cleaning thanks to our cleaning staff, repair service, emergency service 24/24).
Information is constantly updated. Simply download the iOS App or follow our social media pages (see links on this page).
With its wide selection of 250 furnished apartments in Zurich, PABS Résidences und Appartements AG offers you a great deal of choice. The standard minimum rental period for furnished apartments is one month. A furnished apartment is usually available for last minute bookings for rental periods of 14 days or longer.

At PABS Ltd., we provide you with comprehensive information and a list of furnished apartments in Zurich with plenty of great value offers (by telephone or email). Our standard apartments include: a modern, well-equipped kitchen, TV, appliances and household infrastructure as well as fresh sheets and towels. The rental price for all apartments includes the costs for electricity, water and heating, TV, weekly cleaning and laundry service.

Our top priority at PABS Ltd. is making sure that our clients are satisfied with the apartments they rent.
amenities: ["Kitchen", "Self check-in", "Wifi", "TV", "Lockbox"]

I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: Blueground | Wiedikon, balcony & elev, nr market
description: Discover the best of Zurich, with this two bedroom apartment in District 3, Wiedikon. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this contemporary Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, lovely living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #ZRH172)
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon is Zurich's third district, and has a residential character. This quiet neighborhood is set on the lower slopes of Uetliberg, which makes for some incredible views. There are also hiking trails nearby, including the Planet Trail, an easy two hour hike from Uetliberg to Felsenegg. Wiedikon is home to a variety of restaurants, encompassing everything from fast casual dining to traditional Swiss fare. The Sihlcity shopping mall is the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy, and the surrounding area is home to cocktail lounges and pubs, as well as several notable international restaurants. There are train stations and tram stops throughout Wiedikon, making it easy to get into the heart of the city quickly.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Blueground | Hard, fully furnished & ready
description: Show up and start living from day one in Zurich with this stylish studio Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped District 4, Hard home . (ID #ZRH173)
neighborhood_overview: Hard is one of Zurich's up-and-coming neighborhoods, located west of the city center. The district is easily accessible on foot from the city's major attractions. Numerous cafes, restaurants, and two large supermarkets ensure culinary satisfaction. For sports enthusiasts, Hard offers the Hardau sports hall and a Crossfit fitness studio. To the south of Hard lies the impressive Letzigrund Stadium, with a capacity of 50,000 spectators. The neighborhood's green lung is the beautiful Bullingerhof Park. Hard is connected to the rest of the city via several bus, tram, and S-Bahn lines, with additional access to long-distance transportation through the Hardbrücke train station.
